name: CruzFM
0:
”Alexa, launch cruz f.m. yorkton.”
”Alexa, open cruz f.m. yorkton.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cruz f. m. yorkton
des:
Listen to Cruz FM, variety that rocks. in Yorkton Saskatchewan that broadcasts on 94.1, 95.3 and 102.9. Listen live and access on demand content.
Once enabled, just say: "Alexa, open cruz f.m. yorkton" and Alexa will guide you from there!
After that, you can say things like:
 * "Listen to on demand"
 * "Resume"
 * "On demand options"
When playing audio, you can say:
 * Alexa, pause
When playing on-demand content, you can skip to an older show by saying:
 * Alexa, next
And navigate to the previous segment by saying:
 * Alexa, go back
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
